channel.title: Custom Crowns - Pink Background [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey. I added custom crows to my client. And some people are saying RGB 255,0,255 = pink. And other are saying not to use that. What background colour am I going to use then?
I tried with RGB = 255, 0 , 255. But I still got pink background. Isn't my client supporting transparency or what?
